name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: English to Urdu & Urdu to English Translation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select any English, Urdu or Roman Urdu word to see its translation. You can also view definitions, quotes, idioms & related words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select any English, Urdu or Roman Urdu word to see its translation. You can use this extension to view multiple meanings of a word from English to Urdu, Urdu to English, Roman Urdu to English, English to Roman Urdu, Roman Urdu to Urdu and Roman Urdu to Urdu. To help understand the word better 'Meaning In' also provides definitions, example sentences, quotations, idioms and closely related words to your selected word. Complete features list is given below;

✔ Auto detection of English, Urdu & Roman Urdu words
✔ English to Urdu Translation
✔ Urdu to English Translation
✔ Roman Urdu to English Translation
✔ Roman Urdu to Urdu
✔ Urdu to Roman Urdu
✔ Word Idioms
✔ Idioms Translations (English to Urdu)
✔ Idioms Translations (Urdu to English)
✔ Word Definitions 
✔ Example Sentences
✔ Related Words
✔ Add/Edit/Delete Words
✔ Extremely lightweight (less than 25kb)

Simply select any English, Urdu or Roman Urdu word, right-click on the selected word to open contextual menu and click on the 'Meaning In' menu that will open a small popup with all of the translation details. To know more about the word, a link is also provided that will take you to a detailed page of the word. There is also an edit button that anyone can click to improve the dictionary by adding, editing or deleting any word.

'Meaning In' is a collaborative effort to develop world's best English-Urdu translation services including quote translations, poetry translations, songs meanings, name meanings, etc... and we welcome everyone who would like to be part of this initiative.
